name: Netsh Allow Group Policy on Microsoft Defender Firewall
description: Adversaries may  modify system firewalls in order to bypass controls limiting network usage
query: (process.executable:/.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Aa][Dd][Vv][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ww][Aa][Ll][Ll].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ww][Aa][Ll][Ll].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ss][Ee][Tt].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Rr][Uu][Ll][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp]\=.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Nn][Ee][Ww].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee]\=[Yy][Ee][Ss].*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\netsh.exe AND process.command_line:*advfirewall* AND process.command_line:*firewall* AND process.command_line:*set* AND process.command_line:*rule* AND process.command_line:*group\=* AND process.command_line:*new* AND process.command_line:*enable\=Yes*)`
